SourceLocation * locFirst
 All syntactic constructs have infmormation about positions of their tokens, so the analysis is connected up to source code level. This is the first token of some syntax object.

 All syntactic constructs have infmormation about positions of their tokens, so the analysis is connected up to source code level. This is the last token of some syntax object.
